title: Derailed, Ep. 4: The Fast Train
description: When Wisconsin rejected $810 million in federal stimulus money for high-speed rail, the money was redistributed to other states. California got the largest chunk to go toward a rail line connecting San Francisco and Los Angeles, a project that is still ongoing.
author: web-team@wpr.org (Wisconsin Public Radio)
media:credit: A map showing the proposed initial construction of California's bullet train
itunes:title: Derailed: The Fast Train
